com.sk89q.worldedit.function.visitor

Class DownwardVisitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sk89q.worldedit.function.visitor.BreadthFirstSearch
      • com.sk89q.worldedit.function.visitor.RecursiveVisitor
        • com.sk89q.worldedit.function.visitor.DownwardVisitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Operation

    public class DownwardVisitor
extends RecursiveVisitor
    Visits adjacent points on the same X-Z plane as long as the points pass the given mask, and then executes the provided region function on the entire column.

    This is used by //fill.

      Create a new visitor.
